ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( NOT(ISBLANK(ampi__Baseline__c)) && NOT(ISBLANK( Baseline_Qualitative__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Target_Qualitative_LOP__c)) && NOT(ISBLANK( Target_Qualitative_LOP__c)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please only enter a value for the Baseline OR Qualitative Baseline field, Target OR Qualitative Target field.
